errors.error_description: The instructions for `pip` installation are in the wrong logical order. It suggests running qtconsole before confirming its dependencies are installed, which will cause an error.
correction_candidates: Restore the original text: "**Note:** Make sure that Qt is installed. Unfortunately, Qt is not installed when using pip. The next section gives instructions on doing it."
Add the command `pip install pyqt5` before `pip install qtconsole`.
Change the section to recommend installing with conda instead.
Combine the installation into one line: `pip install qtconsole pyqt5`.
errors.golden_answer: Restore the original text: "**Note:** Make sure that Qt is installed. Unfortunately, Qt is not installed when using pip. The next section gives instructions on doing it."
